src: Иако се градња камених пирамида наставила до краја Старог краљевства, ништа није надмашило пирамиде у Гизи у њиховој величини и техничкој изузетности градње. Древни Египћани из Новог краљевства дивили су се споменицима њихових претходника, који су до тада били стари већ преко хиљаду година.
mt: Although construction of stone pyramids continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, nothing surpassed the pyramids at Giza in their size and technical excellence of construction. The ancient Egyptians of the New Kingdom were awed by the monuments of their predecessors, which were already over a thousand years old.
ref: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

src: Сваке године у периоду октобра скоро 1,5 милиона биљоједа путује ка јужним низијама, прелазећи реку Мару, од северних брда због киша. А затим натраг на север преко запада, поново прелазећи реку Мара, након киша отприлике у априлу. Регија Серенгети се састоји од Националног парка Серенгети, Резервата Нгоронгоро и Резервата Масва Гејм у Танзанији и Националног резервата Масаи Мара у Кенији.
mt: 1.5 million herbivores travel to the southern plains each year, crossing the Mara River from the northern hills for the rains. And then back north across the west, again crossing the Mara River after the rains, about April. The Serengeti region consists of the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and the Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Masai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: Сваке године у периоду октобра скоро 1,5 милиона биљоједа путује ка јужним низијама, прелазећи реку Мару, од северних брда због киша. А затим натраг на север преко запада, поново прелазећи реку Мара, након киша отприлике у априлу. Регија Серенгети се састоји од Националног парка Серенгети, Резервата Нгоронгоро и Резервата Масва Гејм у Танзанији и Националног резервата Масаи Мара у Кенији.
mt: 1.5 million herbivores travel to the southern plains each year, crossing the Mara River from the northern hills for the rains. And then back north across the west, again crossing the Mara River after the rains, about April. The Serengeti region consists of the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and the Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Masai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: По завршетку битке за Француску, Немачка се почела спремати за инвазију на острво Британију. Немачка је нападу дала кодно име „Операција морски лав“. Већина тешког наоружања и залиха британске војске била је изгубљена када се евакуисала из Денкерка, тако да је војска била прилично слаба. Али Краљевска морнарица је још увек била много јача од Немачке морнарице („Кригсмарине“) и могла је уништити било коју нападачку флоту која би била послата преко Енглеског канала. Међутим, врло мало бродова Краљевске морнарице се налазило близу вероватних освајачких путева, пошто су се адмирали плашили да ће их потопити немачки напад из ваздуха.
mt: After the Battle of France, Germany began preparing for the invasion of the island of Britain. Germany gave the attack the codename "Operation Sea Lion". Most of the heavy weaponry and supplies of the British army were lost when it was evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was relatively weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy ("Kriegsmarine") and could have destroyed any attacking fleet that would have been sent across the English Channel. However, very few ships of the Royal Navy were near the likely invasion routes, as admirals were afraid that they would be sunk by German air attack.
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: Кренимо са објашњењем о плановима Италије. Италија је углавном била „млађи брат“ Немачке и Јапана. Војска и морнарица им је била слабија, иако су управо изградили четири (4) нова брода непосредно пред почетак рата. Главни циљеви Италије биле су афричке земље. Да би освојили те земље, морали би да имају базу за лансирање трупа, тако да би трупе могле да плове Медитеранским морем и изврше инвазију на Африку. Због тога су морали да се отарасе британских база и бродова у Египту. Поред тих акција, италијански борбени бродови нису смели ништа друго да раде. А сад што се тиче Јапана. Јапан је био острвска држава, баш као и Британија.
mt: We move on to the explanation of Italy's plans. Italy was mostly the "younger brother" of Germany and Japan. Its army and navy were weaker, although it had just built four (4) new ships just before the start of the war. Italy's main objectives were the African countries. In order to conquer those countries, they would need a base for launching troops, so that the troops could sail the Mediterranean Sea and carry out an invasion of Africa. For this reason, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. In addition to these actions, Italian warships could do nothing else. And now, as for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain.
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: Искрцавање на Дан Д и битке које су уследиле ослободиле су север Француске, али југ још увек није био слободан. Водили су је „вишијевски“ Французи. То су били Французи који су се 1940. године помирили са Немцима и удружили се са њима уместо да се боре против њих. Дана 15. августа 1940. године, савезници су напали јужну Француску, инвазија је названа „Операција Драгун“. За само две недеље, Американци и снаге Слободне Француске су ослободили југ Француске и кренули су ка Немачкој.
mt: The landings on D-Day and the battles that followed freed northern France, but the south was still not free. The "Vichy" French were in charge. These were the French who had reconciled with the Germans in 1940 and allied themselves with them instead of fighting against them. On August 15, 1940, the Allies attacked southern France, the invasion was called "Operation Dragoon". In just two weeks, the Americans and the Free French forces had freed southern France and were heading towards Germany.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: Подморнице су пловила пројектована да путују под водом и да остану тамо током дужег временског периода. Подморнице су коришћене у Првом и Другом светском рату. Тада су биле изузетно споре и имале су  прилично ограничен домет испаљивања. На почетку рата су углавном путовали по површини мора, али како је радар почео да се развија и постаје све тачнији, подморнице су биле приморане да иду испод воде како не би биле уочене. Немачке подморнице звале су се U-бродови. Немци су били врло добри у навигацији и управљању својим подморницама. Због њиховог успеха са подморницама, после рата Немцима није дато много истих у посед.
mt: Submarines are designed to travel under water and remain there for a long period of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. At the beginning of the war they were very slow and had a limited range of fire. At the beginning of the war they mostly traveled on the surface of the water, but as the radar began to develop and become more accurate, submarines were forced to go under water so they would not be detected. German submarines were called U-boats. The Germans were very good at navigation and handling their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war the Germans were not given many of them.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: До 17. септембра 1939. пољска одбрана је већ била сломљена, а једина нада је било повлачење и реорганизација дуж Румунског мостобрана. Међутим, ови планови су застарели скоро преко ноћи, када је преко 800.000 војника из Црвене армије Совјетског Савеза ушло и створило белоруске и украјинске фронтове након окупације источних области Пољске кршењем Мировног споразума у Риги, Совјетско-пољског пакта о ненападању и других међународних споразума, како билатералних, тако мултилатералних.
mt: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense had already been broken, and the only hope was a retreat and reorganization along the Romanian Bridgehead. However, these plans became obsolete almost overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Red Army of the Soviet Union entered and created the Belorussian and Ukrainian fronts after the occupation of eastern areas of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact and other international agreements, both bilateral and multilateral.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Италијанима у Северној Африци није добро ишло скоро од самог почетка. У року од недељу дана од италијанске објаве рата 10. јуна 1940. године, британски 11. коњички пук је заузео тврђаву Капуцо у Либији. У заседи источно од Бардије, Британци су заробили главног инжењера италијанске десете армије, генерала Ластућија. 28. јуна, маршал Итало Балбо, генерални гувернер Либије и очигледни наследник Мусолинија, убијен је грешком италијанске противавионске артљерије при слетању у Тобрук.
mt: It was not going well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had captured the fortress of Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the chief engineer of the Italian Tenth Army, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, Governor-General of Libya and the obvious heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire from Italian anti-aircraft artillery while landing in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Тибетански будизам је заснован на учењима Буде, али она су била проширена стазом љубави махајана и многим техникама индијске јоге. У принципу, тибетски будизам је веома једноставан. Састоји се из кундалини јоге, медитације и стазе свеобухватне љубави. Уз кундалини јогу се буди кундалини енергија (енергија просветљења) кроз јога позе, вежбе дисања, мантре и визуелизације. Средиште тибетанске медитације је божанство Јога. Визуелизацијом различитих божанстава чисте се енергетски канали, активирају се чакре и ствара се просвећена свест.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but they were expanded by the path of love Mahayana and many techniques of Indian yoga. In principle, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini yoga, meditation and the path of all-encompassing love. With Kundalini yoga, Kundalini energy (energy of enlightenment) is awakened through yoga poses, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the god Yoga. Visualizing different gods cleanses the energy channels, activates chakras and creates enlightened consciousness.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Тибетански будизам је заснован на учењима Буде, али она су била проширена стазом љубави махајана и многим техникама индијске јоге. У принципу, тибетски будизам је веома једноставан. Састоји се из кундалини јоге, медитације и стазе свеобухватне љубави. Уз кундалини јогу се буди кундалини енергија (енергија просветљења) кроз јога позе, вежбе дисања, мантре и визуелизације. Средиште тибетанске медитације је божанство Јога. Визуелизацијом различитих божанстава чисте се енергетски канали, активирају се чакре и ствара се просвећена свест.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but they were expanded by the path of love Mahayana and many techniques of Indian yoga. In principle, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini yoga, meditation and the path of all-encompassing love. With Kundalini yoga, Kundalini energy (energy of enlightenment) is awakened through yoga poses, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the god Yoga. Visualizing different gods cleanses the energy channels, activates chakras and creates enlightened consciousness.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Програм је почео у 8.30 увече према локалном времену (15:00 UTC). Познати певачи широм земље су извели баџане, односно песме оданости, посвећене стопалима Шри Шајам. Певач Санџу Шарма започео је вече, за њим је уследио Џаи Шанкар Чаудари који је отпевао бађан Чхапппан бхог. Певач Раџу Канделвал га је пратио. Тада је Лака Синг преузео вођство у певању баџана. Сто осам тањира Чапан Бога (у хиндуизму, то је педесет шест различитих јестивих намирница, као што су слаткиши, воће, орашасти плодови, јела и остало што се нуди божанству) послужено је Баба Шајаму. Лака Синх је такође представио и чапан бог бајан. Пратио га је и певач Рају Xанделвал.
mt: The program began at 8.30 pm local time (15:00 UTC).  Famous singers across the country performed bhajans, or songs of devotion, dedicated to the feet of Shri Shyam.  Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jay Shankar Chaudhary who sang the bhajan Chhappan Bhog.  Singer Raju Kandelwal followed.  Then Lakshmi Singh took over the singing of bhajans.  Eighty-eight items of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, this is fifty-six different edible items, such as sweets, fruits, nuts, food and other things offered to the deity) were served to Baba Shyam.  Lakshmi Singh also presented the Chhappan Bhog bhajan.  Singer Raju Kandelwal followed.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: Прославе су започеле специјалном тачком светски познате групе Cirque du Soleil. Уследио је Истамбулски државни симфонијски оркестар, Јањичарски војни бенд и певачи Фатих Еркоч и Муслум Гурсес. Онда су Мевлевије (вртећи дервиши) изашле на сцену. Турска дива Сезен Аксу имала је наступ са италијанским тенором Алесандром Сафином и грчким певачем Харисом Алексиуоум. За крај, турска плесна група Ватра Анадолије извела је плесну тачку „Троја“.
mt: Celebrations began with a special point of the world-famous Cirque du Soleil group. The Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, the Janissary Military Band, and singers Fatih Erkoc and Muslum Gurses followed. Then the Mevlevi (whirling dervishes) came out on stage. Turkish diva Sese Aksu had a performance with Italian tenor Alessandro Safin and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. For the end, the Turkish dance group Vatra Anadoli performed the dance point "Troy".
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: Путницима је подељена вода док су чекали на врућини од преко 32 °C степена (90 °F). Ватрогасни капетан Скот Коунс je рекао: „Био је врућ дан у Санта Клари, са температурама изнад 30 степени. Бити заробљен на ролеркостеру је у најмању руку непријатно, колико год да то траје, а требало је најмање сат времена да прву особу спусте са вожње.”
mt: Passengers were given water while waiting in the heat of over 32 °C degrees (90 °F). Fire Captain Scott Coons said, "It was a hot day in Santa Clara, with temperatures over 30 degrees. Being trapped on a roller coaster is at least uncomfortable, however long it takes, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Према најновијим информацијама, очитавања нивоа мора указала су на то да је створен цунами. У близини Паго Пага и Ниуеа су регистроване одређене активности цунамија. Велика оштећења и повређивања нису забележена на Тонги, али привремено није било струје, што је наводно спречило Тонганске власти да приме упозорење о цунамију које је издао PTWC (Центар за временску прогнозу у Пацифичкој временској зони). Четрнаест школа на Хавајима које се налазе на обали или близу ње било је затворено током целог дана у среду, упркос томе што су сва упозорења повучена.
mt: According to the latest reports, tsunami readings indicated a tsunami was created. Near Pago Pago and Niuea, some tsunami activity was reported. No major damage or injuries were reported in Tonga, but temporary power outages prevented Tongan authorities from receiving a tsunami warning issued by PTWC (Pacific Time Zone Weather Center). Fourteen schools on Hawaii near the coast or close to it were closed for the entire day on Wednesday, despite all warnings being withdrawn.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Џони Рид, сувозач А1ГП новозеландског тима, данас је исписао историју возећи најбрже преко лучког моста Окланд, старог 48 година, на Новом Зеланду, на легалан начин. Г. Рид је успео да вози новозеландски ауто A1GP, Црну лепотицу, брзином већом од 160 km/h седам пута преко моста. Новозеландска полиција имала је проблема при коришћењу радарских пиштоља и није могла да види колико брзо иде господин Рид због тога што је Црна Лепотица толико ниска, а једини пут када је полиција успела да измери брзину кретања господина Рида било је када је успорио на 160 km/h.
mt: Johnny Reid, co-driver of the A1GP New Zealand team, today wrote history by driving the fastest ever over the Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand's oldest bridge, in a legal manner. Mr. Reid managed to drive the New Zealand A1GP car, the Black Beauty, at a speed of over 160 km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using radar guns and could not see how fast Mr. Reid was going because the Black Beauty is so low, and the only time the police managed to measure Mr. Reid's speed was when he slowed down to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Земљотрес умерене јачине потресао је западну Монтану у понедељак у 22:08. Није било ниједног непосредног извештаја о штети примљеног од стране Геолошке службе Сједињених Америчких Држава (ГССАД) и њеног Државног информационог центра за земљотресе. Земљотрес је погодио подручје око 20 km (15 миља) северно-североисточно од Дилона, односно око 65 km (40 миља) јужно од Бута.
mt: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana on Monday at 10:08 p.m. There were no immediate reports of damage received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake struck an area about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, or about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Ирачки затвор Абу Граиб је запаљен до је трајала побуна. Затвор је постао озлоглашен када су тамо откривени случејеви злостављања затвореника, након што су га преузеле америчке трупе.
mt: The Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq was set ablaze during a riot. The prison became notorious when abuse of prisoners was discovered, after it was taken over by American troops.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Бенд је отказао наступ на Ратном меморијалном стадијуму у Мауију ком је требало да присуствује 9000 људи и извинио се обожаватељима. Менаџерска компанија бенда, HK Management Inc, није иницијално дала никакво објашњење када су 20.септембра отказали концерт, али су наредног дана навели да је проблем био у логистици.
mt: The band cancelled a performance at the War Memorial Stadium in Maui, which was expected to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc, initially gave no explanation when they cancelled the concert on September 20, but the next day cited logistical problems.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: Наводно се пљачкање наставило преко ноћи у више области, док представници закона нису били на улицама Бишкека. Један посматрач описао је Бишкек како тоне у анархију, док хорде лутају улицама и пљачкају продавнице робе широке потрошње. Неколико грађана Бишкека је за ту анархију окривило демонстранте са југа.
mt: Lootings continued overnight in several areas, while law enforcement representatives were not on the streets of Bishkek. One observer described Bishkek as sinking into anarchy, as hordes roam the streets and loot shops of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed the anarchy on the southern protesters.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Наводно се пљачкање наставило преко ноћи у више области, док представници закона нису били на улицама Бишкека. Један посматрач описао је Бишкек како тоне у анархију, док хорде лутају улицама и пљачкају продавнице робе широке потрошње. Неколико грађана Бишкека је за ту анархију окривило демонстранте са југа.

src: Претходно је извршни директор Ринга Џејми Симиноф прокоментарисао како је компанија настала кад није могао да чује звоно на вратима из своје продавнице у гаражи. Рекао је да је направио WiFi звонце. Симиноф је рекао да се продаја појачала након његовог појављивања у „Shark Tank“ епизоди где је панел одбио да финансира његово предузеће у оснивању. Крајем 2017, Симиноф се појавио на QVC, каналу за ТВ куповину. Ринг је такође постигао судски споразум са ривалском компанијом за обезбеђење, АДТ Корпорацијом.
mt: Previously, Ring's executive director Jamie Siminoff commented that the company was created when he couldn't hear the doorbell from his store in the garage. He said he made Wi-Fi doorbells. Siminoff said sales increased after his appearance in the "Shark Tank" episode where the panel rejected financing his business. At the end of 2017, Siminoff appeared on QVC, a TV shopping channel. Ring also reached a legal settlement with rival security company ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Емисија PBS има више од две десетине Еми награда, а њено приказивање траје краће само у односу на Улицу Сесами и Суседства господина Роџерса. Свака епизода серије се фокусирала на теме одређене књиге и онда би истражила ту тему кроз разне приче. У свакој емисији гледаоци би добили и препоруке за књиге које би деца требало да потраже у библиотеци. Џон Грант, из продукције WNED Бафало (матична станица емисије Ридинг рејнбоу) изјавио је: „Ридинг рејнбоу је дао деци разлог да читају, ... љубав према читању - [емисија] је подстакла децу да узму књигу у руке и читају.“ Појединци, укључујући Џона Гранта, верују да су криза финансирања и промена у приступу образовном телевизијском програму имали улогу у окончању емисије.
mt: PBS has over two dozen Emmy awards, and its broadcast time is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the series focused on a theme from a book and then explored that theme through various stories. In each episode viewers were given recommendations for books that children should look for in the library. John Grant, from the WNED Buffalo production (the flagship station of the Reading Rainbow) said, "Reading Rainbow gave kids a reason to read,... love of reading - [the show] inspired kids to take a book in their hands and read." Individuals, including John Grant, believe that the financial crisis and changes in educational television programming had a role in the end of the series.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Челници Амстердама и музеја Ане Франк саопштили су да су дрво напале гљивице и да постоји претња по јавно здравље због непосредне опасности од пада. Планирано је је да буде смањено у уторак, али је одложено након хитног заседања суда.
mt: Amsterdam and Anne Frank Museum officials announced that the tree was attacked by fungi and there was a threat to public health due to the immediate danger of falling. It was planned to be reduced on Tuesday, but it was postponed after an emergency court hearing.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: Ослобођење животиња и Краљевско друштво за спречавање окрутности према животињама (РСПЦА) поново позивају на обавезно постављање CCTV камера за видео-надзор у свим аустралијским кланицама. Дејвид Ошенеси, главни инспектор RSPCA (Краљевског удружења за превенцију насиља над животињама) Новог Јужног Велса рекао је за ABC да надзор и инспекција кланица треба да буду уобичајене у Аустралији. „CCTV би сигурно послао снажан сигнал онима који раде са животињама да им је њихова добробит највећи приоритет.“
mt: Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for mandatory CCTV video surveillance in all Australian abattoirs. David O'Shannessy, RSPCA (Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals) New South Wales chief inspector told ABC that oversight and inspection of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. "CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those working with animals that their welfare is their top priority."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Вести о хапшењу још једног ученика који је имао везе са пуцањем у школи 21. марта, су се прошириле данас кроз заједницу Ред Лејк, у време одржавања сахране Џефа Вејса и три од девет жртава. Власти су мало тога званично изјавиле, осим што су потврдиле данашње хапшење. Међутим, извор са сазнањима о истрази рекао је Минеаполис Стар-Трибјуну да је то био Луис Џордејн, шеснаестогодишњи син председавајућег племена Црвеног језера Флојда Џордејна. У овом тренутку се не зна које ће оптужбе бити подигнуте, као ни како су власти дошле до дечака, али је поступак против малолетног лица покренут на савезном суду.
mt: News of the arrest of another student who had ties to the shooting at the school on March 21st, spread today through the Red Lake community, at the time of the funeral of Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims. Authorities have little officially said, except that today's arrest was confirmed. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, the sixteen-year-old son of Red Lake Nation Chairman Floyd Jourdain. At this time it is not known what charges will be filed, nor how authorities came to the boy, but a proceeding against a minor has been initiated in federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Организатори протеста рекли су да се око 100 000 људи окупило у немачким градовима попут Берлина, Келна, Хамбурга и Хановера. Полиција је проценила да је у Берлину било 6500 демонстраната. Протести су се такође одигравали у Паризу, Софији у Бугарској, Вилњусу у Литванији, Валети на Малти, Талину у Естонији, и Единбургу и Глазгову у Шкотској. У Лондону је протестовало око 200 људи испед канцеларија великих власника ауторских права. Прошлог месеца, дошло је до великих протеста у Пољској када је та земља потписала АКТА споразум, што је довело до тога да је пољска влада за сада одлучила да не ратификује споразум. Летонија и Словачка су одложиле процес прикључивања „ACTA“.
mt: Organizers said about 100,000 people gathered in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover. Police estimated 6,500 demonstrators in Berlin. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valletta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. About 200 people protested outside the offices of major copyright holders in London. Last month, there were large protests in Poland when that country signed the ACTA agreement, which led the Polish government to decide not to ratify the agreement. Latvia and Slovakia have postponed the accession process to "ACTA".
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: Пријављено је отприлике 60 случајева прегревања неисправних ајпод уређаја, што је довело до укупно шест пожара, али и лакших опекотина код четири особе. Јапанско Министарство економије, трговине и индустрије саопштило је да је било упознато са 27 несрећа повезаних са датим уређајима. Прошле недеље је МЕТИ објавио да га је Епл обавестио о 34 додатна инцидента са прегревањем, које је компанија назвала „незначајним“. Министарство је одговорило тако што је назвало Еплово одлагање извештаја „заиста вредним жаљења“.
mt: 60 cases of overheating of non-functional iPods have been reported, leading to six fires and four minor burns. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry has been informed of 27 incidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had notified it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which Apple called "insignificant". The ministry responded by calling Apple's delay in reporting the incidents "truly regrettable".
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

Прошле недеље је МЕТИ објавио да га је Епл обавестио о 34 додатна инцидента са прегревањем, које је компанија назвала „незначајним“. Министарство је одговорило тако што је назвало Еплово одлагање извештаја „заиста вредним жаљења“.
mt: 60 cases of overheating of non-functional iPods have been reported, leading to six fires and four minor burns. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry has been informed of 27 incidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had notified it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which Apple called "insignificant". The ministry responded by calling Apple's delay in reporting the incidents "truly regrettable".
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: Извршни директор компаније Епл Стив Џобс представио је уређај тако што је изашао на бину и извадио ајфон из џепа фармерки. Током свог двочасовног говора изјавио је да ће „данас Епл да изврши потпуни преображај телефона, данас ћемо ући у историју“.
mt: Apple CEO Steve Jobs introduced the device by coming out on stage and pulling an iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his two-hour talk, he said the company would "change the phone today, we will enter history."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Тренутна сенаторка и прва дама Аргентине Кристина Фернандес де Кирхнер објавила је кандидатуру за председничке изборе јуче увече у Ла Плати, граду који је 50 километара (31 миљу) далеко од Буенос Ајреса. Гђа Киршнер је објавила своју намеру да се кандидује за председницу у Аргентинском позоришту, истом месту које је користила 2005. за почетак своје кампање за Сенат као члан провинцијске делегације Буенос Ајреса.
mt: Current Argentine senator and first lady Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her candidacy for the presidential election last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president in the Argentine Theater, the same place she used in 2005 to start her campaign for the Senate as a member of the Buenos Aires provincial delegation.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMA је сазнала да упркос томе што је видео стримован на интернету, Велики брат није прекршио закон о цензури садржаја на интернету, с обзиром да тај видео није био сачуван на веб сајту Великог брата. Регулација интернет садржаја је предвиђена Законом о радиодифузијским услугама, али, да би се неки садржај сматрао интернет садржајем, он мора бити физички присутан на серверу.
mt: ACMA has learned that despite the fact that the video was streamed on the internet, Big Brother did not break the law of internet content censorship, as that video was not saved on the Big Brother website. Internet content regulation is provided by the Broadcasting Services Act, but to be considered internet content, it must be physically present on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: Питер Костело, аустралијски ризничар и човек који ће највероватније наследити премијера Џона Хауарда као вођа либералне партије, подржао је нуклеарну индустрију у Аустралији. Г. Костело је рекао да када производња нукларне енергије постане економски исплатива, Аустралија треба да ради на њеном коришћењу. „Ако постане комерцијализовано, требало би да набавимо. Односно, не постоји у принципу ниједан приговор у случају нуклеарне енергије“, рекао је г. Костело.
mt: Peter Costello, an Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has supported the nuclear industry in Australia. Mr. Costello said that when nuclear energy production becomes economically viable, Australia should work on its use. "If it becomes commercialized, we should buy it. That is, there is no principled objection to nuclear energy," Mr. Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Пошто је доступно само осамнаест медаља дневно, многе земље нису успеле да дођу до подијума за доделу медаља. Међу њима је Холандија, из које је Ана Јохемсен која је јуче завршила као девета у женској класи Super-G категорије, и Финска, из које је Катја Саринен која је завршила као десета у истом такмичењу. Аустралијанац Мичел Гурли завршио је на једанаестом месту мушке листе Супервелеслалома у стајаћој категорији. Чешки такмичар Олдрич Јелинек завршио је на шеснаестом месту мушке листе Супервелеслалома у седећој категорији. Арли Веласкез из Мексика је завршио као петнаести у седећем супервелеслалому за мушкарце. Новозеланђанин Адам Хал је завршио као девети у стојећем супервелеслалому за мушкарце. Пољски скијаш са оштећењем вида Мачеј Крезел и водич Ана Огарзинска завршили су на тринаестом месту у супервелеслалому. Севернокорејац Џонг Сеорк Парк је завршио на двадесет четвртом месту у мушком седећем супервелеслалому.
mt: 18 medals are awarded daily, and many countries have not been able to reach the podium for medal distribution. Among them is the Netherlands, from which Anna Johansson who finished yesterday as ninth in the women's Super-G category, and Finland, from which Kati Sundling who finished as tenth in the same competition. Australian Mitchel Gourley finished as eleventh in the men's Super-G standing category. Czech skier Oldrich Jelinek finished as sixteenth in the men's Super-G sitting category. Arli Velasquez from Mexico finished as fifteenth in the men's Super-G sitting. New Zealander Adam Hal finished as ninth in the men's Super-G standing. Polish skier with visual impairment Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished as thirteenth in the Super-G. North Korean skier Jong Seok Park finished as twenty-fourth in the men's Super-G sitting.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: Суђење је одржано у Краљевском суду у Бирмингему и завршило се 3. августа. Водитељ, који је ухапшен на лицу места, негирао је напад и тврдио је да је користио шипку како би се заштитио од флаша које је преко тридесет људи бацало на њега. Блејк је такође осуђен за покушај спречавања извршења правде. Судија је рекао Блејку да је „скоро неизбежно“ да ће отићи у затвор.
mt: The trial was held at the Royal Courts of Justice in Birmingham and ended on 3 August. The leader, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed to have used a stick to protect himself from bottles thrown at him by over thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to impede the course of justice. The judge told Blake that he was "almost inevitable" to go to prison.
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Остале теме на дневном реду на Балију обухватају спашавање преосталих светских шума и размену технологија које помажу да земље у развоју расту на мање загађујуће начине. УН се такође надају да ће завршити припреме фонда за помоћ земљама погођеним глобалним загревањем како би се избориле са последицама. Новац би могао бити уложен у обезбеђивање кућа од поплава, бољу водопривреду, и диверзификацију усева.
mt: Other topics on the Bali agenda include saving the world's remaining forests and exchanging technologies that help developing countries grow less polluting. The UN also hopes to finalize preparations for a fund to help countries hit by global warming to cope with the consequences. The money could be invested in flood-proof homes, better water management, and crop diversification.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: Нигерија је претходно најавила да планира да се придружи афричкој CFTA-и у недељи пред самит. Комесар АУ за трговину и индустрију, Алберт Мучанга, најавио је да ће се Бенин прикључити. Комесар је рекао: „Још увек се нисмо сложили око правила порекла и царинских олакшица, али оквир који имамо је довољан да почнемо са трговином 1. јула 2020. године.“
mt: Nigeria had previously announced plans to join the African CFTA in the week before the summit. African Union Trade and Industry Commissioner Albert Muchanga announced that Benin would join. The commissioner said, "We have not yet agreed on the rules of origin and customs concessions, but the framework we have is sufficient to start trading on July 1, 2020."
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Добила је и значајне похвале током свог периода боравка у Атланти и тада јој је одана почаст за иновативну урбану едукацију. Титула Националног надзорника године јој је додељена 2009. године. Школе у ​​Атланти су за време доделе награда забележиле велико побољшање у резултатима тестова. Убрзо након тога, Атланта Журнал Конститушн је објавио извештај у ком се виде проблеми са резултатима теста. Извештај је показао да су се бодови на тестовима повећали невероватно брзо, и наводи се да је сама школа приметила проблеме, али да није реаговала на основу тих сазнања. Доказ који је уследио је показао да је Хал фалсификовао тестове заједно са 34 образовна службеника, а за то је оптужен 2013.
mt: She received significant praise during her tenure in Atlanta and was honored for innovative urban education. She was awarded National Superintendent of the Year in 2009. Schools in Atlanta had seen dramatic improvement in test scores at the time of the award. Shortly thereafter, the Atlanta Journal Constitution published a report showing problems with test scores. The report showed that test scores had increased at an incredible rate, and the school itself had noted problems, but had not acted on the basis of that knowledge. Evidence that followed showed that Hall had falsified test scores along with 34 education officials, and was charged in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Добила је и значајне похвале током свог периода боравка у Атланти и тада јој је одана почаст за иновативну урбану едукацију. Титула Националног надзорника године јој је додељена 2009. године. src: Једна бомба је експлодирала пред канцеларијом Генералног гувернера. Још три бомбе су експлодирале близу зграда владе у периоду од два сата. Према неким извештајима, званично је погинуло осам особа, а званични извештаји потврђују да је до 30 људи било повређено. Коначни бројеви и даље нису познати.
mt: One bomb exploded in front of the General Governor's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a two-hour period. Officially, eight people were killed, and official reports confirm that 30 people were injured. Final numbers are still unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: Двадесетједногодишњи Хесус се прикључио Манчестер Ситију у јануару прошле, 2017. године из бразилског клуба Палмеирас за наводну суму од 27 милиона фунти. Од тада је Бразилац за клуб наступио у 53 меча у свим такмичења и постигао 24 гола.
mt: 20-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played in 53 matches across all competitions and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Хостел се срушио у Меки, светом исламском граду, у отприлике 10 сати овог јутра по локалном времену. У згради је боравило доста ходочасника који су дошли да посете свети град уочи хаџилука. Гости хостела су углавном били из Уједињених Арапских Емирата. Број погинулих је барем 15, а очекује се да још порасте.
mt: A hostel collapsed in Makkah, the holy Islamic city, at around 10 am local time. The building housed many pilgrims who had come to visit the holy city before the Hajj. The guests of the hostel were mostly from the United Arab Emirates. At least 15 are dead, and the number is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Оба сателита, који теже више од 1000 фунти и који путују отприлике 17.500 миља на сат, сударила су се 491 миљу изнад Земље. Научници кажу да је експлозија до које је довео судар била огромна. И даље покушавају да установе колики је био пад и како ће то утицати на Земљу. Стратешка команда канцеларије  Министарства одбране Сједињених Држава трага за остацима. Резултати анализе мапе ће бити објављени на јавном веб сајту.
mt: The two satellites, which weigh more than 1000 pounds and which travel about 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was enormous. They are still trying to determine the size of the impact and how it will affect the Earth. The Strategic Command of the United States Department of Defense is searching for debris. The results of the analysis will be published on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Батен је 2008. године био на 190. месту листе 400 најбогатијих Американаца, а његово богатство процењено је на 2,3 милијарде долара. Дипломирао је на Колеџу за уметност и науку Универзитета у Вирџинији 1950. године и истакао се као важан донатор те установе.
mt: 2008, he was ranked 190th on the Forbes 400 list of richest Americans, with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts and Sciences at the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a major donor to that institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: Гувернер Калифорније Арнолд Шварценегер потписом је учинио пуноважним закон који забрањује продају или изнајмљивање насилних видео-игрица малолетницима. Предлог закон захтева да насилне видео игре које се продају у држави Калифорнија буду означене налепницом са натписом „18“, а да се њихова продаја малолетнику кажњава новчаном казном од 1000 долара по прекршају.
mt: Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires that violent video games sold in the state of California be labeled with a "18" sticker, and that their sale to minors be punished with a fine of $1000 per offense.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: Дувал, који је ожењен и отац двоје одрасле деце, није оставио јак утисак на Милера, кога се прича тиче. Када су питали да прокоментарише, Милер је рекао: „Мајк пуно прича током саслушања ... Спремао сам се, па нисам обратио пажњу на оно што је говорио.“
mt: Miller, who is married and the father of two adult children, did not make a strong impression on Miller, who was questioned. When asked to comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing... I was prepared, so I didn't pay attention to what he was saying."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: Дувал, који је ожењен и отац двоје одрасле деце, није оставио јак утисак на Милера, кога се прича тиче. Када су питали да прокоментарише, Милер је рекао: „Мајк пуно прича током саслушања ... Спремао сам се, па нисам обратио пажњу на оно што је говорио.“
mt: Miller, who is married and the father of two adult children, did not make a strong impression on Miller, who was questioned. When asked to comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing... I was prepared, so I didn't pay attention to what he was saying."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: Премијер Стивен Харпер се у уторак, након 25 минута дугог састанка са вођом НДС-а Џеком Лајтоном у канцеларији Премијера сложио да пошаље владин „Акт о чистом ваздуху“ комитету свих странака на разматрање, пре његовог другог читања. Лејтон је тражио измене закона конзервативаца о заштити животне средине током састанка са премијером, захтевајући „темељну и потпуну ревизију“ закона о заштити животне средине Конзервативне странке. Откако се Савезна влада умешала у жељи да преузме финансирање болнице Мерсеи у Девонпорту у Тасманији, државна влада и поједини савезни посланици критиковали су овај чин као уводни маневар у савезне изборе који ће бити расписани до новембра. Али премијер Џон Хауард рекао је да је чин спроведен само да би се осигурало да објекти болнице не буду деградирани од стране тасманијске владе, дајући додатних 45 милиона AUD.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the federal government's "Clean Air Act" to a committee of all parties for review, after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton in the Prime Minister's office. Layton had demanded changes to the Conservative government's environmental protection law during the meeting with the prime minister, calling for a "fundamental and complete review" of the Conservative Party's environmental protection law. Since the federal government had intervened to take over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and individual federal MPs had criticized the move as a pre-election maneuver by the federal government. But Prime Minister John Howard said the move was only to ensure that the hospital's facilities were not degraded by the Tasmanian government, giving an additional $45 million AUD.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: И цијануринска киселина и меламин су нађени у узорцима урина љубимаца који су умрли након конзумације контаминиране хране за љубимце. Два једињења међусобно реагују формирајући кристале који могу блокирати рад бубрега, рекли су истраживачи са универзитета. Истраживачи су приметили да се кристали формирају у мачијем урину додавањем меламина и цијануринске киселине. Састав ових кристала се подудара са оним нађеним у урину погођених животиња, када се упореди уз помоћ инфрацрвеног спектроскопа (FTIR).
mt: Cyanuric acid and melamine were found in the urine of pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with each other to form crystals that can block the kidneys' function, researchers from the university said. Researchers noticed that crystals formed in a cat's urine when melamine and cyanuric acid were added. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected animals when compared using an infrared spectrometer (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: Синхуа је известила да су владини истражитељи у среду пронашли две „црне кутије“, које садрже записе лета. Колеге рвачи су такође одали почаст Луни. Томи Дример је изјавио: „Луна је била прва краљица екстрема. Моја прва менаџерка. Луна је преминула у ноћи два месеца. Прилично јединствено налик њој. Јака жена.“ Дастин „Голдаст“ Ранелс је прокоментарисао: „Луна је била једнако чудна као и ја...можда и више...волим је и недостајће ми...надам се да је на бољем месту.“
mt: Sinhua reported that government investigators found two "black boxes" containing flight records on Wednesday. Colleagues also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Drimer said, "Luna was the first queen of extremes. My first manager. Luna died in the night two months ago. Quite unique like her. Strong woman." Dustin "Goldie" Ranelle commented, "Luna was just as weird as I...maybe more...I love her and I miss her...I hope she's in a better place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Синхуа је известила да су владини истражитељи у среду пронашли две „црне кутије“, које садрже записе лета. Колеге рвачи су такође одали почаст Луни. src: Иако је троје људи било у кући када ју је ударио ауто, нико од њих није био повређен. Међутим, возач је задобио озбиљне повреде главе. Пут на ком је дошло до судара је био привремено затворен док су службе хитне помоћи ослобађале возача из црвеног Аудија ТТ. У почетку је био хоспитализован у болници Џејмс Паџет у Грејт Јармуту. Накнадно је премештен у Аденбрукову болницу у Камбриџу.
mt: Although three people were in the house when it was hit by a car, none of them were injured. However, the driver sustained serious head injuries. The road on which the collision occurred was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from his red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalized at James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was later transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Игре су почеле у 10.00 ујутру уз одлично време и, осим што је средином јутра ромињала киша, брзо се разведрило и био је то савршен дан за рагби 7. Јужна Африка, најбоље рангирани на турниру, је добро почела лаком победом 26 : 0 против Замбије, која је у 5. шеширу. Иако су изгледале поприлично „зарђало“ на мечу против својих јужних сестара, Јужна Африка се постепено поправљала како је турнир одмицао. Њихова дисциплинована одбрана, вештина баратања лоптом и изузетан тимски рад је оно што их је издвојило, те је било јасно да је то тим који треба победити.
mt: The games started at 10:00 am with excellent weather and, except for a shower in the middle of the morning, it was a perfect day for rugby 7. South Africa, the best ranked on the tournament, started well with a comfortable 26 : 0 victory over Zambia, who were in the 5th tier. Although they looked quite "rusted" in the match against their southern sisters, South Africa gradually improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defense, skillful handling of the ball and exceptional team work was what set them apart, and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Током последње три деценије, упркос томе што је званично остала комунистичка држава, Кина је развила тржишну економију. Прве економске реформе су спроведене под вођством Денг Ксјаопинга. Од тада, економска величина Кине је порасла за 90 пута. По први пут, прошле године Кина је извезла више аутомобила од Немачке и надмашила је Сједињене Државе као највеће тржиште ове индустрије. БДП Кине би могао бити већи од америчког за две деценије.
mt: Over the last three decades, despite remaining officially a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were implemented under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time last year, China exported more automobiles than Germany and surpassed the United States as the largest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than America's in two decades.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: "„Уложићемо напор да знатно редукујемо емисију угљен-диоксида по јединици BDP-а до 2020. године у поређенњу са нивоом из 2005. године“, изјавио је Ху. Није одредио бројку тог смањења, говорећи да ће износи бити донети на основу економске производње Кине. Ху је охрабрио земље у развоју да „избегавају стару стазу прво загађивања а касније чишћења“. Додао је да „од њих, међутим, не би требало да буде затражено да преузму на себе обавезе које превазилазе њихову фазу развоја, одговорности и способности""."
mt: "We will make great efforts to reduce the emission of carbon dioxide per unit of GDP by 2020 compared with the 2005 level," Hu said. He did not give a number for the reduction, saying the figures would be based on China's economic production. Hu encouraged developing countries to "avoid the old path of first polluting and then cleaning up." He added that "among them, however, it should not be required to take on obligations that exceed their stage of development, responsibilities and capabilities."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: Добротворна здравствена организација Мангола, Лекари без граница и Светска здравствена организација сматрају да је ово најгора епидемија која је регистрована у земљи. Заступник за Medecines Sans Frontier, Ричард Верман, је изјавио: „Ангола се креће ка најгорој епидемији икада и ситуација у Анголи остаје веома лоша.“
mt: The charity Medical Emergency Relief International, Doctors Without Borders and the World Health Organization consider this to be the worst epidemic ever recorded in the country. Richard Verma, a representative of Medecines Sans Frontier, said: "Angola is moving towards the worst epidemic ever and the situation in Angola remains very bad."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Директор јавног тужилаштва Киер Стармер, краљевски адвокат, дао је изјаву јутрос најављујући гоњење и Хјуна и Прајса. Хјун је поднео оставку и у кабинету ће га заменити посланик Ед Дејви. Очекује се да посланик Норман Ламб преузме позицију Министра економије која остаје упражњена након одласка Дејвија. Хјуну и Прајсу је за 16. фебруар заказано појављивање пред Вестминстерским прекршајним судом.
mt: Director of Public Prosecutions Keir Starmer, the Queen's Counsel, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and will be replaced in the cabinet by MP Ed Davey. It is expected that MP Norman Lamb will take the position of Minister of Economy which remains vacant after Davey's departure. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear before Westminster Magistrates' Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: Прича коју је Камиј Сен-Санс представио у француској опери је о уметнику „чијим животом управљају љубав за дрогом и Јапаном“. Извођачи стога пуше џоинте канабиса на сцени, а само позориште позива публику да се придружи.
mt: The story that Camille Saint-Saëns presented in his French opera is about an artist "whose life is controlled by love for drugs and Japan." Performers therefore smoke joint cannabis on stage, and the theater itself invites the audience to join.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: Прича коју је Камиј Сен-Санс представио у француској опери је о уметнику „чијим животом управљају љубав за дрогом и Јапаном“. Извођачи стога пуше џоинте канабиса на сцени, а само позориште позива публику да се придружи.

src: Леонов, познат и као „космонаут бр. 11“, био је део првобитног совјетског тима космонаута. Дана 18. марта 1965. године, извео је први излазак у отворени свемир са посадом (EVA), или „ход по свемиру“, и остао је сам ван летелице нешто преко дванаест минута. За свој рад добио је медаљу „Хероја Совјетског Савеза“, највеће одликовање Совјетског Савеза. 10 година касније, водио је совјетски део Аполо-Сојуз мисије што је симболично означило крај свемирске трке.
mt: Leonov, known as "Cosmonaut No. 11", was a member of the original Soviet team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first EVA, or "space walk", from a spacecraft with a crew, and remained alone outside the spacecraft for something over twelve minutes. For his work he was awarded the title of Hero of the Soviet Union, the highest honor of the Soviet Union. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo-Soyuz mission, which symbolically marked the end of the space race.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: Након несреће, Гибсон је превезен у болницу, али је убрзо преминуо. Возач камиона, стар 64 године, није повређен у судару. Само возило је однесено са места несреће у отприлике 12:00 по гриничком времену, истог дана. Радник гараже близу места несреће изјавио је: „Деца су чекала да пређу улицу и свуда се зачуло вриштање и плакање.” Сви су побегли са места несреће.
mt: After the accident, Gibson was taken to the hospital, but soon died. The truck driver, aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle was removed from the scene of the accident at around 12:00 GMT, the same day. A garage worker near the scene of the accident said: "The children were waiting to cross the street and everywhere was heard screaming and crying." All fled the scene.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."
