src: Од 1.400 људи који су анкетирани пре федералних избора 2010. године, број оних који се противе томе да Аустралија постане република порастао је за 8 процената од 2008. године. Привремена премијерка Џулија Гилард трвдила је током кампање за федералне изборе 2010. године, да је веровала да би Аустралија требало да постане република на крају владавине Елизабете II. Тридесет четири посто анкетираних дели ово мишљење и жели да краљица Елизабета II буде последњи аустралијски монарх. У екстремима анкете, 29 одсто испитаника верује да Аустралија треба што пре да постане република, док 31 одсто верује да Аустралија никад не би требало да постане република.
mt: 1,400 people were surveyed before the 2010 federal election, the number of those who oppose Australia becoming a republic increased by 8% from 2008. Acting Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the 2010 federal election campaign that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Elizabeth II's reign. Thirty-four percent of the survey believe this and want Queen Elizabeth II to be the last Australian monarch. In the extremes of the survey, 29% believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31% believe Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Лесли Аун, говорник „Фондације Комен“, рекао је да је организација донела ново правило којим се не дозвољава додела средстава или финансирање организација које су под правном истрагом. Коменина политика је дисквалификовала Планирано родитељство због нерешене истраге, о томе на који начин Планирано родитељство троши и пријављује свој новац, коју спроводи заступник Клиф Стернс. Стернс у својој улози председавајућег у Пододбору за надгледање и истраживања а који се налази под Одбором за енергетику и трговину, истражује да ли се порез користи за финансирање абортуса кроз Планирано родитељство.
mt: Leslie Ann, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization has adopted a new rule that prohibits the awarding of funds or financing to organizations under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood because of an unresolved investigation into how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money, which is being conducted by Cliff Sterns, who serves as chairman of the Board of Directors and Audit and Investigation Committee, which is under the Board of Directors for Energy and Commerce. Sterns, in his role as chairman of the Board of Directors and Audit and Investigation Committee, is investigating whether tax money is being used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: Полиција Мађа Прадеша пронашла је украдени лаптоп и мобилни телефон. Заменик генералног инспектора Д. К. Арја рекао је: „Ухапсили смо пет особа које су силовале Швајцаркињу и вратили смо њен мобилни и лаптоп.“ Оптужени су именовани као Баба Канџар, Бута Канџар, Рампро Канџар, Газа Канџар и Вишну Канџар. Полицијска надзорница Чанда Шекар Соланки је изјавила да су се отпужени појавили у суду са покривеним лицима.
mt: Police in Madhya Pradesh found a stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D.K. Arya said, "We have arrested five people who raped a Swiss woman and returned her mobile and laptop." The accused were named as Baba Kandhar, Buto Kandhar, Rampuro Kandhar, Gaja Kandhar and Vishnu Kandhar. Police Inspector Chanda Shaker Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces.
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: „ASUS Eee PC”, који је раније представљен широм света из разлога уштеде новца и функционалности, постао је главна тема у току ај-ти месеца у Тајпеју 2007. године. Али потрошачко тржиште лаптоп рачунара ће се радикално изменити и диверсификовати након што је извршни директор Јуан из Републике Кине 2007. године ASUS-у доделио Тајванску награду за одрживост.
mt: "ASUS Eee PC", which was previously introduced worldwide for the reasons of saving money and functionality, became the main topic during the IT month in Taipei 2007. But the consumer market for laptop computers will be radically changed and diversified after the executive director of the Republic of China 2007. year ASUS was awarded the Taiwanese award for sustainability.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: „ASUS Eee PC”, који је раније представљен широм света из разлога уштеде новца и функционалности, постао је главна тема у току ај-ти месеца у Тајпеју 2007. године. Али потрошачко тржиште лаптоп рачунара ће се радикално изменити и диверсификовати након што је извршни директор Јуан из Републике Кине 2007. године ASUS-у доделио Тајванску награду за одрживост.
mt: "ASUS Eee PC", which was previously introduced worldwide for the reasons of saving money and functionality, became the main topic during the IT month in Taipei 2007. But the consumer market for laptop computers will be radically changed and diversified after the executive director of the Republic of China 2007. year ASUS was awarded the Taiwanese award for sustainability.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: Проблем је почео 1. јануара када је десетине локалних становника почело да се жали поштанској служби у Обаназави, како нису добили своје традиционалне и редовне новогодишње честитке. Пошта се јуче извинила грађанима и у медијима након открића да је дечак сакрио преко 600 поштанских докумената, укључујући и 429 новогодишњих честитики, које нису испоручене намењеним примаоцима.
mt: The problem began on January 1st when dozens of local residents began complaining to the postal service in Obanazawa, that they had not received their traditional and regular New Year's greeting cards. The post office apologized to the citizens and in the media after discovering that a boy had hidden over 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's greeting cards, that were not delivered to the intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Мари је изгубио први сет у тајбрејку, након што су оба такмичара задржала све своје сервисе у сету. Дел Потро је рано стекао предност у другом сету, али и је и он ушао у тај-брејк након резултата од 6-6. Потро је тада добио третман за раме, али је успео да се врати у игру.
mt: Mari lost the first set in a tiebreaker, after both players held all their serves in the set. Del Potro took an early lead in the second set, but he too entered a tiebreaker after the score of 6-6. Potro then received treatment for a back, but managed to come back into the game.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: У пратњи тих званичника, уверавао је становнике Тексаса да се предузимају мере да би се заштитила безбедност јавности. Пери је нагласио: „Постоји врло мало места на свету који су боље опремљена да се суоче са изазовом који постоји у овом случају.“ Гувернер је додао: „Данас смо сазнали да је утврђено да су нека деца школског узраста била у контакту са пацијентом.“ Затим је изјавио: „Ово је озбиљан случај. Будите уверени да наш систем добро функционише.“
mt: In the presence of those officials, Perry assured Texans that measures were being taken to protect public safety. Perry emphasized, "There is very little place in the world better equipped to deal with the challenge that exists in this case." The governor added, "Today we learned that some school-aged children were in contact with the patient." He then stated, "This is a serious case. Be assured that our system is working well."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: Много пре „Дејли шоу-а“ и „Колберовог извештаја“, Хек и Џонсон су осмисли публикацију која би била пародија на вести - као и стил извештавања - још док су били студенти на Универзитету у Вашингтону 1988. Од свог оснивања „Onion“ је постао право царство новинске пародије, са штампаном верзијом, веб локацијом која је привукла 5.000.000 јединствених посета у току месеца октобра, личним огласима, 24-часовном мрежом вести, подкастима, и са недавно лансираним светским атласом који се зове Наш глупи свет. Ал Гор и генерал Томи Франкс опуштено чаврљају о својим омиљеним насловима – Горов је онај кад је Онион известио да су он и Типер имали најбољи секс у животу након његовог пораза на Факултетским изборима  2000. године. Мноштво њихових писаца наставило је да има велики утицај на емисије Џона Стјуарта и Стивена Колберта, које су пародије вести.
mt: Before the Daily Show and the Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson conceived a publication that would be a parody of the news — as well as the style of reporting — while they were still students at the University of Washington in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a full-fledged empire of news parody, with a printed version, a web site that attracted 5 million unique visitors in October, personal ads, a 24-hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually chuckle over their favorite headlines — Gore's is the one when The Onion reported that he and Tipper had the best sex of their lives after his defeat in the 2000 presidential election. Many of their writers have gone on to have a big influence on the shows of Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert, both of whom are parodies of the news.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: Протест је почео око 11:00 по локалном времену (UTC+1) у Вајтхолу преко пута улаза у полицијом опкољен Даунинг стрит, где је званична резиденција премијера. Мало после 11:00, демонстранти су блокирали саобраћај на северном краку аутопута у Вајтхолу. У 11:20 полиција је затражила од демонстраната да се помере даље на тротоар, наводећи да морају да пронађу баланс између права на протест и успоравања саобраћаја. Око 11:29 протест се одржавао уз Вајтхол, поред Трафалгар сквера, дуж Странда, крећући се поред Алдвича и уз Кингсвеј према Холборну, где се одвијао Пролећни форум Конзервативне странке у хотелу Гранд Конаут Румс.
mt: The protest began at around 11:00 am local time (UTC+1) in Whitehall across the road from the Downing Street entrance to the police cordoned off Downing Street, where the official residence of the prime minister is. Shortly after 11:00, demonstrators blocked traffic on the northbound carriageway of the A4 in Whitehall. At 11:20, police requested that the demonstrators move further onto the pavement, citing the need to find a balance between the right to protest and traffic disruption. Around 11:29 the protest was taking place along Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along Strand, moving past Aldwych and along Kingsway towards Holborn, where the Spring Forum of the Conservative Party was taking place in the Grand Connaught Rooms.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: „Сад имамо четворомесечне мишеве који нису дијабетичари, а раније су имали дијабетес“, додао је. Др Ехуд Ур, професор медицине на Универзитету Далхаузи у Халифаксу, у Новој Шкотској, и председник клиничког и научног одсека Канадског удружења за дијабетес, упозорио је да је истраживање још увек у повоју. Попут још неких стручњака, он је скептичан по питању да ли се дијабетес може излечити, напомињући да ова открића немају значај за људе који већ болују од дијабетеса типа 1.
mt: "Now we have four-month-old mice that are not diabetic, who were diabetic before," he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chairman of the clinical and scientific section of the Canadian Diabetes Association, warned that the research is still in its infancy. Like other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no significance for people who already suffer from type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: „Сад имамо четворомесечне мишеве који нису дијабетичари, а раније су имали дијабетес“, додао је. Др Ехуд Ур, професор медицине на Универзитету Далхаузи у Халифаксу, у Новој Шкотској, и председник клиничког и научног одсека Канадског удружења за дијабетес, упозорио је да је истраживање још увек у повоју. mt: "Now we have four-month-old mice that are not diabetic, who were diabetic before," he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chairman of the clinical and scientific section of the Canadian Diabetes Association, warned that the research is still in its infancy. Like other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no significance for people who already suffer from type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: Твин Отер је покушавао да слети у Кокоди јуче као лет Ерлајнс PNG CG4684, али већ једном није успео. Отприлике десет минута пре но што је требало да слети у току другог приласка, нестао је. Место где се срушио авион је пронађено данас, и толико је неприступачно да су два полицајца спуштена у џунглу како би пешачила до тог места и потражила преживеле. Потрагу је отежавало исто лоше време које је и изазвало неуспешно слетање.
mt: A Twin Otter was attempting to land at Kokoda yesterday as flight Air Niugini PNG CG4684, but had failed once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land on its second approach, it disappeared. The crash site was found today, and so inaccessible that two police officers were rappelled into the jungle to hike to that site and look for survivors. The same bad weather that caused the failed landing also hampered the search.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: „Срећом, мени се није ништа десило, али сам видео морбидну сцену како људи покушавају да сломе прозоре како би се извукли. Људи су ударали у прозорска окна столицама, али су прозори били несаломиви. „Једно стакло се коначно сломило и људи су почели да излазе кроз прозор“, рекао је преживели Францишек Ковал.
mt: "Fortunately, nothing happened to me, but I saw a gruesome scene as people tried to break the windows to get out. People were hitting the window glass with chairs, but the windows were shatterproof. "One glass finally broke and people started coming out through the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: Тропска олуја Данијел, четврта именована олуја у атлантској сезони урагана 2010. године, настала је у источном делу Атлантика. Олуја, која се налази отприлике на 3000 миља од Мајамија на Флориди, одржава максималне брзине ветра од 40 миља на сат (64 km/h). Научници из Националног центра за урагане предвиђају да ће Даниел прерасти у ураган до среде. Како је олуја далеко од копна, и даље је тешко проценити потенцијални утицај на Сједињене Државе или Карибе.
mt: Tropical Storm Daniel, the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, formed in the eastern Atlantic. The storm, about 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, is maintaining maximum wind speeds of 40 mph (64 km/h). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict Daniel will strengthen into a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from land, it is still difficult to estimate potential impact on the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Др Ли је такође изразио забринутост због извештаја о деци у Турској која су сада заражена вирусом птичијег грипа А(H5N1) и притом нису болесна. Он је изјавио да нека истраживања указују на то да би болест морала да постане мање смртоносна пре него што би могла да узрокује глобалну епидемију. Постоји забринутост да би пацијенти могли да инфицирају више људи приликом обављања својих дневних рутина, уколико симптоми грипа остану благи.
mt: Dr Lee also expressed concern over reports of children in Turkey who are now infected with the avian flu virus A(H5N1) but are not ill. He said some research indicates the disease would have to become less deadly before it could cause a global epidemic. There is concern that patients could infect more people during their daily routines if flu symptoms remain mild.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: Од ноћи 9. августа, око Моракота било је удаљено отприлике седамдесет километара од кинеске провинције Фуџијан. Тајфун се премешта ка Кини брзином која се процењује на 11 km/h.
mt: 70 km from the Chinese province of Fujian, Typhoon Morakot moved towards China at a speed estimated at 11 km/h.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: Председник Америке Џорџ Буш је стигао у Сингапур 16. новембра ујутру, чиме је започео једнонедељну турнеју по Азији. Дочекао га је заменик премијера Сингапура, Вонг Кан Сенг, и дискутовао је о проблемима трговине и тероризма са премијером Сингапура Лијем Сјенлунгом. Након недеље пораза на изборима на половини мандата, Буш је упознао јавност са проширењем трговине у Азији.
mt: 16 November 2006, President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore in the morning, thus beginning a one-week tour of Asia. He was greeted by Deputy Prime Minister of Singapore, Wong Kan Seng, and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Prime Minister of Singapore Lee Hsien Loong. After a midterm election defeat on half of his term, Bush met the public with an expansion of trade in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Данашње обавештење се такође односи на продужење владине одлуке донете у марту ове године којом се финансирају додатни вагони. Додатних 300 чини укупно 1.300 вагона који ће бити набављени да би се смањила гужва.
mt: Today's announcement also extends the government's decision made in March this year to fund additional carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages that will be purchased to reduce congestion.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: Рекла је: „Не постоје никакве информације које би указале на то да се неминовно може очекивати напад.“ Међутим, смањење нивоа опасности на озбиљну не значи да је општа опасност нестала.“
mt: She said: "There are no indications that an attack is inevitable." However, reducing the level of danger to a serious one does not mean that the general danger has disappeared.
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Нова изборна комисија (CEP) од девет чланова је јуче положила заклетву под Мартелијем. То је Мартелијева пета изборна комисија у четири године. Прошлог месеца председничка комисија препоручила је претходну оставку CEP-а као део пакета мера како би покренула земљу ка новим изборима. Ова комисија је била Мартелијев одговор на широко распрострањене антирежимске протесте који су почели у октобру. Понекад насилни протести су узроковани неодржавањем избора, од којих су неки на реду још од 2011. године.
mt: A new nine-member electoral commission (CEP) took the oath under Martelly. It is Martelly's fifth electoral commission in four years. Last month, the presidential commission recommended the previous CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country toward new elections. This commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that began in October. Sometimes violent protests were sparked by the failure to hold elections, some of which have been on hold since 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: Гимнастичка федерација САД подржава писмо Олимпијског комитета САД и прихвата апсолутну потребу олимпијске породице за промоцијом безбедног окружења за све наше спортисте. Слажемо се са изјавом USOC-а  да би у интересу наших спортиста и клубова, као и њиховог спорта, боље било да се настави са значајним променама унутар наше организације, уместо да дође до десертификације. САД Гимнастика подржава независну истрагу која би могла да обзнани како је злоупотреба пропорције, коју су храбро описале жртве Лерија Насара, могла толико дуго остати неоткривена, те прихвата све неопходне и одговарајуће промене. Гимнастички тим САД-a и Oлимпијски комитет САД-а имају исти циљ - да гимнастику, као и друге спортове, учине што је могуће сигурнијим како би спортисти следили своје снове у сигурном, позитивном и оснаженом окружењу.
mt: The USA Gymnastics Board of Directors supports the letter from the U.S. Olympic Committee and recognizes the absolute necessity of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all our athletes. We agree with the USOC statement that it is in the best interest of our athletes and clubs, as well as their sport, to continue with significant changes within our organization, rather than to face decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that could reveal how abuse of power, which brave survivors of Larry Nassar described, could have gone undetected for so long, and accepts all necessary and appropriate changes. The USA Gymnastics team and the U.S. Olympic Committee have the same goal – to make gymnastics, as well as other sports, as safe as possible so athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Америчка морнарица је додала и да испитује тај случај. Такође су рекли у саопштењу: „Екипа тренутно ради на одређивању најбољег метода за безбедно извлачење брода.“ Брод за деминирање класе Авенџер је био на путу до Пуерто Принцесе у Палавану. Додељен је Седмој флоти морнарице САД са седиштем у Сасебу, у Нагасакију, у Јапану.
mt: The U.S. Navy also said it was investigating the incident. It also said in a statement: "The team is currently working to determine the best method for safely removing the boat." The minehunter was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It was assigned to the Seventh Fleet of the U.S. Navy with headquarters in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: Касно у недељу, председник Сједињених Америчких Држава Доналд Трамп, изјавио је преко секретара за штампу да ће америчке трупе напустити Сирију. Саопштење је издато по завршетку телефонског разговора Трампа са председником Турске Реџепом Тајипом Ердоганом. Турска би такође преузела обавезу чувања заробљених бораца ISIS-а којима су, како се наводи у изјави, европске државе одбиле повратак.
mt: Late Sunday, President of the United States Donald Trump announced that American troops will leave Syria. The statement was issued after a phone call between Trump and President of Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdogan. Turkey would also take the responsibility of guarding ISIS prisoners, which European states have refused to repatriate, according to the statement.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Коалиција и авганистанске трупе су се преместиле у ту област како би осигурале то место, а друге коалиционе летелице су послате у помоћ. Рушење хеликоптера се догодило високо у планинским теренима, и верује се да је био резултат непријатељске ватре. Напори да се пронађе место рушења су отежани лошим временом и неприступачним тереном.
mt: The coalition and Afghan forces have moved into the area to secure it, and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The helicopter crash occurred high in mountainous terrain, and it is believed to have been the result of enemy fire. Efforts to locate the crash site are hampered by bad weather and difficult terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Коалиција и авганистанске трупе су се преместиле у ту област како би осигурале то место, а друге коалиционе летелице су послате у помоћ. Рушење хеликоптера се догодило високо у планинским теренима, и верује се да је био резултат непријатељске ватре. Напори да се пронађе место рушења су отежани лошим временом и неприступачним тереном.
mt: The coalition and Afghan forces have moved into the area to secure it, and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The helicopter crash occurred high in mountainous terrain, and it is believed to have been the result of enemy fire. Efforts to locate the crash site are hampered by bad weather and difficult terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: По изградњи бране 1963. године, заустављене су сезонске поплаве које су шириле седимент кроз реку. Седимент је био неопходан за стварање пешчаних спрудова и плажа, које су служиле као станишта дивљим биљкама и животињама. То је довело до изумирања две врсте риба, а још две су постале угрожене, укључујући грбавог клена. Иако ће се ниво воде подићи за само неколико стопа након поплаве, званичници се надају да ће то бити довољно да се обнове еродирани пешчани спрудови који се налазе низводно.
mt: After the dam was built in 1963, seasonal floods that carried sediment through the river were stopped. The sediment was needed to create sand spits and beaches, which served as habitat for wild plants and animals. This led to the extinction of two fish species, and two others became endangered, including the grubby grunt. Although the water level will only rise by a few inches after the flood, officials hope that will be enough to restore eroded sand spits downstream.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: Амбасада Сједињених Америчких Држава у Најробију у Кенији упозорила је да „екстремисти из Сомалије“ планирају самоубилачке бомбашке нападе у Кенији и Етиопији. Сједињене Државе кажу да су добиле информације из неоткривених извора у којима се посебно помиње употреба бомбаша самоубица који ће разнети „истакнуте знаменитости“ у Етиопији и Кенији.
mt: The United States Embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, warned that "Somali extremists" are planning suicide bombings in Kenya and Ethiopia. The United States say they have received information from undisclosed sources, specifically mentioning the use of suicide bombers who will target "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: Познати грчки адвокати, Сакис Кечађоглу и Џорџ Николакопулос су затворени у атинском затвору Коридалус, након што су осуђени за уцењивање и корупцију. Последица овога је велики скандал који је избио унутар грчке правне заједнице услед разоткривања незаконитих радњи које су судије, адвокати, правни заступници и пуномоћници чинили током претходних година. Пре неколико недеља, након информација које је објавио новинар Макис Триантафилопулос у својој популарној телевизијској емисији „Џунгла” на Алфа ТВ, посланик у Парламенту и адвокат, Петрос Мантувалос, био је приморан на оставку пошто су чланови његовог кабинета били умешани у злоупотребу службеног положаја и корупцију. Поред тога, врховни судија Евангелос Калоусис је ухапшен јер је проглашен кривим за корупцију и недолично понашање.
mt: Famous Greek lawyers, Saki Kechaglou and George Nikolakopoulos were arrested in the Athens prison of Korydallos, after being convicted of extortion and corruption. The result of this is a great scandal that has erupted within the Greek legal community due to the revelation of illegal activities that judges, lawyers, legal representatives and proxies have been doing in the past years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by journalist Makis Triantafyllopoulos in his popular television show "Jungle" on Alpha TV, the Member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos, was forced to resign after his cabinet members were involved in the abuse of office and corruption. In addition, Supreme Court Judge Evangelos Kalos was arrested after being found guilty of corruption and misconduct.
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Робин Утапа је направио највише бодова у изменама, 70 бодова за само 41 лопту, погађајући 11 четворки и 2 шестице. Ударачи средњег реда, Сачин Тендукар и Рахул Дравид су добро наступили и направили су сарадњу на сто метара. Али, након што је изгубила капитенски викет, Индија је постигла само 36 трчања и изгубила 7 викета до завршетка инингса.
mt: Robin Uthappa made the most runs in the changes, 70 runs off 41 balls, hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. The middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid played well and made a partnership on 100 runs. But after losing the captain's wicket, India scored only 36 runs and lost 7 wickets by the end of the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Администратор Комонса Адам Куерден је изразио своју фрустрацију због брисања када је разговарао са Викињузом прошлог месеца. „Он [Вејлс] нас је буквално лагао од почетка. Прво, док се претварао да је све ово из правних разлога. Друго, тако што се претварао да нас слуша, све до брисања његове уметности.“ Незадовољство заједнице довело је до тренутних напора да се израде смернице које ће се бавити сексуалним садржајем на веб сајту на коме се хостују милиони медија са отвореном лиценцом.
mt: Wikimedia Foundation administrator Adam Wale expressed his frustration when he spoke to Wikinews last month. "He [Wales] was basically lying to us from the start. First, by pretending that this was all for legal reasons. Second, by pretending to listen to us, all the way up to deleting his art." Community dissatisfaction led to current efforts to draft guidelines that will deal with sexual content on the website that hosts millions of media with open licenses.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: Нису сви подржавали увођење рангова за жене. Амир Кан, освајач сребрне медаље на Олимпијади 2004. године, рекао је: „Најискреније, мислим да жене не треба да се боре. То је моје мишљење.” Упркос својим коментарима, изјавио је да ће пружити подршку британским такмичарима на Олимпијским играма које се 2012. одржавају у Лондону.
mt: Not all supported the introduction of ranks for women. Amir Khan, silver medalist at the 2004 Olympics, said: "Most sincerely, I think women should not fight. That is my opinion." Despite his comments, he said he would support British competitors at the 2012 Olympics in London.
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Питер Ленц, 13-то годишњи возач мотора, погинуо је након што је учествовао у судару на моторној тркачкој стази у Индијанаполису. Док је возио круг за загревање, Ленц је пао са свог мотора, а затим га је ударио колега тркач Ксавијер Зајат. Одмах му је медицинско особље на стази пружило помоћ, и транспортован је у локалну болницу где је касније умро. Зајат је био неповређен у несрећи.
mt: 13-year-old Peter Lenz, a motorcyclist, died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While making a warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his motorcycle, and was then hit by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. Medical personnel on the track immediately provided aid, and he was transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was uninjured in the accident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Путовање авионом може бити застрашујуће искуство за људе свих порекла и старосних група, посебно ако раније нису летели или су доживели трауматичан догађај. То није нешто чега се треба стидети: не разликује се од личних страхова и несвиђања по питању других ствари које има баш много људи. За неке, разумевање како летелица ради, и шта се дешава током лета, може им помоћи да превазиђу страх који се базира на непознатом или на немогућности да имају контролу над догађајима.
mt: Flying can be a frightening experience for people of all backgrounds and age groups, especially if they have not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from personal fears and dislikes about other things that many people have. For some, understanding how an aircraft works, and what happens during a flight, can help them overcome fear based on the unknown or lack of control over events.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: У данашње време путовање авионом се веома ретко букира директно код авио-компаније без претходног претраживања и упоређивања цена. Некада исти лет може да има веома различите цене на различитим веб локацијама и исплати се поредити резултате претраге, као и погледати цену на самој веб локацији авиокомпаније пре него што резервишете.
mt: In today's world, booking a flight directly with an airline is very rarely the cheapest option. Sometimes the same flight can have very different prices on different web sites, and it pays to compare the results of your search, as well as look at the price on the airline's own web site before you book.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: У данашње време путовање авионом се веома ретко букира директно код авио-компаније без претходног претраживања и упоређивања цена. Некада исти лет може да има веома различите цене на различитим веб локацијама и исплати се поредити резултате претраге, као и погледати цену на самој веб локацији авиокомпаније пре него што резервишете.
mt: In today's world, booking a flight directly with an airline is very rarely the cheapest option. Sometimes the same flight can have very different prices on different web sites, and it pays to compare the results of your search, as well as look at the price on the airline's own web site before you book.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Курирске компаније су добро плаћене за брзу испоруку ствари. Често је време врло битно када се ради о пословним документима, роби или резервним деловима за хитну поправку. На неким рутама веће компаније имају своје сопствене авионе, али за неке друге руте или за мање фирме био је проблем. Ако су послали ствари путем ваздушног теретног превоза, на неким рутама је могуће да су били потребни дани док би се прошло кроз истовар и царину. Једини начин да се брже прође био је да се пртљаг пошаље као пријављен. Прописи о авио-компанијама неће им дозволити да пртљаг пошаљу без путника, где ви улазите у причу.
mt: Courier companies are well paid for fast delivery of things. Often time is very important when dealing with business documents, goods or spare parts for urgent repair. Some larger companies have their own planes, but for some other routes or smaller companies it was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it could take days to go through customs and unloading. The only way to speed up would be to send luggage as checked. Regulations on airlines will not allow them to send luggage without passengers, where you enter the story.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Требало би да пажљиво бирате авио-компанију за често летење унутар савеза. Иако можда мислите да је интуитивно придружити се авио-компанији којом највише летите, требало би да будете свесни да су привилегије које се нуде често различите, а поени за честе летаче су можда већи код друге авио-компаније у оквиру исте алијансе.
mt: You should carefully choose an airline for frequent flying within an alliance. While you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most often, you should be aware that the perks offered are often different, and frequent flyer miles may be greater with another airline within the same alliance.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Требало би да пажљиво бирате авио-компанију за често летење унутар савеза. Иако можда мислите да је интуитивно придружити се авио-компанији којом највише летите, требало би да будете свесни да су привилегије које се нуде често различите, а поени за честе летаче су можда већи код друге авио-компаније у оквиру исте алијансе.
mt: You should carefully choose an airline for frequent flying within an alliance. While you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most often, you should be aware that the perks offered are often different, and frequent flyer miles may be greater with another airline within the same alliance.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Умерено пијте алкохолна пића. Алкохол на свакога различито утиче, а знати сопствену границу је врло важно. Могуће дугорочне здравствене последице претеране конзумације алкохола могу укључивати оштећење јетре и чак слепило и смрт. Потенцијална опасност се повећава када се пије незаконито произведен алкохол. Илегана алкохолна пића могу да садрже разне опасне нечистоће укључујући метанол, који може да проузрокује слепило или смрт чак и у малим дозама.
mt: Drink moderately. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limits is very important. Long-term health consequences of excessive alcohol consumption can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger increases when drinking illegally produced alcohol. Bootleg alcohol can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Округ Канал (холандски: Грачтенгордел) је чувени округ из 17. века који окружује Амстердамски Биненстад. Цео дистрикт се налази на листи светске баштине под заштитом UNESCO-а, због своје јединствене културне и историјске вредности, а вредности њене имовине су међу највишим у земљи.
mt: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is a historic area of 17th-century canals in Amsterdam, Netherlands. The entire district is on the UNESCO World Heritage List for its cultural and historical value, and the value of its property is among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Пном Кром је смештен 12 km југозападно од Сијем Реапа. Овај брдски храм подигнут је крајем 9. века, током владавине краља Јасорвамана. Мрачна атмосфера у храму и поглед на језеро Тонле Сап чине успон на брдо вредним труда. Посета месту може бити погодно укомбинована са излетом бродом на језеро. Пропусница за Ангкор је потребна да би се ушло у храм, тако да немојте заборавити да понесете пасош са собом када се упутите ка Тонле Сапи.
mt: 12 km southwest of Siem Reap, Pnom Krom is a hilltop temple built at the end of the 9th century during the reign of King Yasovarman. The dark atmosphere in the temple and the view of Tonle Sap lake make the climb worthwhile. A visit to the site can be combined with a boat trip on the lake. An Angkor pass is required to enter the temple, so don't forget to bring your passport with you when you head to Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Антарктик је најхладније место на Земљи и окружује Јужни пол. Туристичке посете су скупе, захтевају физичку кондицију, могу да се обављају само у току лета од Новембра до Фебруара, и углавном су ограничене на полуострво, острва и Росово море. Овде лети живи неколико хиљада запослених у неких педесетак база, углавном у тим областима; мали број остаје преко зиме. Унутрашњост Антартика је пуста зараван прекривена са 2-3 km леда. Повремене специјалистичке авионске туре иду у унутрашњост, ради планинарења или да би дошли до Пола који има велику базу.
mt: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are expensive, require physical fitness, can only be done during the summer months of November to February, and are mostly limited to the peninsula, islands and Ross Sea. Here live a few thousand employees in some fifty bases, mostly in those areas; few stay over the winter. The interior of Antarctica is a barren plateau covered with 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist aviation tours go into the interior, for mountaineering or to get to the Pole which has a large base.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Предмодерне опсерваторије су углавном застареле данас, те постоје као музеји или образовна места. Како светлосно загађење у време њиховог процвата није било проблем какав је данас, они се обично могу наћи у градовима или у кампусима, где су били лакше доступни него они изграђени у модерно доба. Већина модерних телескопа су огромна постројења у удаљеним областима са повољним атмосферским условима.
mt: Pre-modern observatories are mostly obsolete today, and exist as museums or educational sites. As light pollution during their heyday was not a problem as it is today, they are usually found in cities or campuses, where they were more accessible than those built in modern times. Most modern telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: С обзиром да се Окланд шири на две луке, постоји много плажа. Најпопуларније су оне у три области: Плаже Северне Обале (у области Северне Луке) се налазе на Пацифичком океану и простиру се од Лонг Беја на северу до Девенпорта на југу. Скоро све плаже су пешчане са безбедним купалиштима, а и на већини њих постоји хлад који прави дрвеће похутукаве. Плаже Тамаки драјв су у луци Вајтемата, у имућним предграђима Мишн Беј и Сент Хелијерс у централном Окланду. То су породичне плаже које су понекад пуне, и са богатим распоном продавница које се нижу уз обалу. Пливање је безбедно.
mt: With Auckland spreading to two harbours, there are many beaches. The most popular are those in three areas: North Shore beaches (in the North Harbour area) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. Almost all are sandy with safe swimming areas, and on most there is a cold drink made from tree bark. The Tamaki Drive beaches are in the Auckland Harbour, in the wealthy suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in central Auckland. They are family beaches that are sometimes crowded, and with a rich range of shops that line the shore. Swimming is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Молим вас имајте у виду да сте у посети месту масовних гробница, као и месту које има готово несрачунљив значај великом делу светског становништва. Постоји и даље много мушкараца и жена који су преживели боравак овде, и још много више оних чији су вољени били убијени или су израбљивани до смрти, како Јевреји тако и не-јевреји. Молимо вас да се према овом месту опходите са достојанством, озбиљношћу и поштовањем какво оно заслужује. Немојте се шалити на тему холокауста или нациста. Не уништавајте место прављењем ознака или урезивањем графита на објекте.
mt: Please be aware that you are visiting a site of mass graves, as well as a site of great significance to much of the world's population. There are still many men and women who survived their stay here, and many more whose loved ones were killed or tortured to death, both Jews and non-Jews. Please approach this site with dignity, seriousness, and respect that it deserves. Do not make light of the Holocaust or the Nazis. Do not destroy the site by making graffiti or carving into objects.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Помоћни језици су вештачки или плански језици, створени с намером олакшавања комуникације између људи који би иначе имали потешкоћа у комуникацији. Одвојени су од „lingua francas“, који су природни или органски језици који из неког одређеног разлога постају доминантни као средство комуникације међу говорницама других језика.
mt: Auxiliary languages are constructed or planned languages, created with the intention of facilitating communication between people who would otherwise have difficulty in communication. They are distinguished from "lingua francas", which are natural or organic languages that for some reason become dominant as a medium of communication between speakers of other languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Помоћни језици су вештачки или плански језици, створени с намером олакшавања комуникације између људи који би иначе имали потешкоћа у комуникацији. Одвојени су од „lingua francas“, који су природни или органски језици који из неког одређеног разлога постају доминантни као средство комуникације међу говорницама других језика.
mt: Auxiliary languages are constructed or planned languages, created with the intention of facilitating communication between people who would otherwise have difficulty in communication. They are distinguished from "lingua francas", which are natural or organic languages that for some reason become dominant as a medium of communication between speakers of other languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Ако прелазите преко северног Балтика током зиме, проверите локацију колибе, с обзиром да пролазак кроз лед узрокује прилично ужасне звуке за оне који су највисе погођени. Крстарења по Санкт Петербургу обухватају у време које се проводи у граду. Путници на крстарењу су изузети од захтева за визу (проверите услове).
mt: If you're crossing the North Sea in winter, check the location of the igloo, as passage through the ice causes quite alarming sounds for those most affected. Cruises around St. Petersburg include time spent in the city. Cruise passengers are exempt from visa requirements (check conditions).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Ако прелазите преко северног Балтика током зиме, проверите локацију колибе, с обзиром да пролазак кроз лед узрокује прилично ужасне звуке за оне који су највисе погођени. Крстарења по Санкт Петербургу обухватају у време које се проводи у граду. Путници на крстарењу су изузети од захтева за визу (проверите услове).
mt: If you're crossing the North Sea in winter, check the location of the igloo, as passage through the ice causes quite alarming sounds for those most affected. Cruises around St. Petersburg include time spent in the city. Cruise passengers are exempt from visa requirements (check conditions).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Званични језици у Барселони су каталонски и шпански. Око половине становника радије говори каталонски, велика већина га разуме, а заправо сви знају шпански. Међутим, већина ознака је само на каталонском, с обзиром да је установљен законом као први официјелни језик. Ипак, шпански се такође доста користи у јавном превозу и у другим објектима. Редовна обавештења у метроу су само на каталонском, али непланирани прекиди се објављују аутоматски на великом броју језика, као што су шпански, енглески, француски, арапски и јапански.
mt: Official languages in Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. About half the population speaks Catalan, a large majority understands it, and in fact everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are only in Catalan, as it is established by law as the first official language. However, Spanish is also used quite a bit in public transport and in other facilities. Regular announcements in the metro are only in Catalan, but unplanned interruptions are automatically announced in a large number of languages, such as Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Данас, у развијеним земљама, пружање делукс услуге ноћења са доручком је подигнуто готово на ниво уметности. Најбољи објекти који пружају ноћења с доручком свакако се такмиче углавном у две главне ствари: ноћење и доручак. Према томе, у најбољим објектима те врсте може се наћи најлуксузнија постељина, можда ручно рађен јорган или старински кревет. Доручак може укључивати сезонске посластице из дате области или домаћинов специјалитет. Окружење може бити стара историјска стара зграда са антикварским намештајем, педантно одржаваним двориштем и базеном.
mt: Today, in developed countries, the provision of deluxe services of sleeping with breakfast has been raised almost to the level of art. The best objects that provide sleeping with breakfast certainly compete mainly in two main things: sleeping and breakfast. Therefore, in the best objects of this kind, you can find the most luxurious bedding, maybe handmade jorgans or antique beds. Breakfast can include seasonal sweets from the given area or the host's specialty. The environment can be an old historic old building with antique furniture, a meticulously maintained courtyard and a pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Град Пекинг у Кини ће бити домаћин Зимских олимпијских игара 2022. године, па ће бити први град који је био домаћин и летње и зимске Олимпијаде. Пекинг ће бити домаћин церемоније отварања и затварања, и такмичења на леду у затвореном. Остали скијашки догађаји биће на скијалишту Таизиченг у Џангђакоу, око 220 km (140 миља) од Пекинга.
mt: Beijing, China will be the host of the 2022 Winter Olympics, making it the first city to host both the Summer and Winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies, and the ice events will be held indoors. Other skiing events will be held at the ski resort of Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Птичји грип, или формалније авијарна инфлуенца, може заразити и птице и сисаре. Код људи је забележено мање од хиљаду случајева, али неки од њих су били фатални. Већина случајева су били људи који раде са живином, али постоји одређени ризик и за посматраче птица.
mt: Bird flu, or formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. In humans, there have been fewer than a thousand cases, but some of them have been fatal. Most cases have been people who work with poultry, but there is a certain risk for bird watchers.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Птичји грип, или формалније авијарна инфлуенца, може заразити и птице и сисаре. Код људи је забележено мање од хиљаду случајева, али неки од њих су били фатални. Већина случајева су били људи који раде са живином, али постоји одређени ризик и за посматраче птица.

src: Викинзи су користили руске водене путеве како би дошли до Црног мора и Каспијског мора. Делови ових путева се још увек могу користити. Проверите да ли су можда потребне посебне дозволе, које ће можда бити тешко добити. Беломорско-балтички канал повезује Северни ледени океан са Балтичким морем, преко језера Онега, језера Ладога и Санкт Петербурга, углавном путем река и језера. Језеро Оњега је такође повезано са Волгом, па је до њега и даље могуће доћи из Каспијског мора преко Русије.
mt: The Vikings used Russian waterways to reach the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea. Parts of these waterways are still in use. Check if special permits are needed, which may be difficult to obtain. The White Sea-Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean with the Baltic Sea, through Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mainly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to the Volga, so it is still possible to reach it from the Caspian Sea through Russia.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Имиграциони контролни пункт је обично прва станица након искрцавања из авиона, брода или другог превозног средства. У неким возовима који прелазе границе, провере се одвијају у возу у покрету, и требали бисте да имате важећу личну карту код себе кад се укрцавате на један од ових возова. У возовима у којима се ноћу спава, пасоше може прикупити кондуктер, тако да вам се неће прекинути сан.
mt: Immigration control points are usually the first stop after disembarking from an airplane, boat or other conveyance. In some trains crossing borders, checks are carried out on the train in motion, and you should have a valid ID card with you when boarding one of these trains. In trains where you sleep at night, the conductor can collect passports, so your sleep will not be interrupted.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: Сингапур је генерално изузетно безбедно место за посету и веома је лако кретати се кроз њега, а можете да купите готово све при доласку. Али с обзриом да се налази у „високим тропима“ на само неколико степени северно од екватора, мораћете да се носите и са топлотом (увек) и са јаким сунцем (када је небо ведро, што је ређе).
mt: Singapore is generally a very safe place to visit and it is very easy to get around, and you can buy almost anything on arrival. But given that it is in the "tropics" just a few degrees north of the equator, you must be prepared for the heat (always) and the strong sun (when the sky is clear, which is less frequent).
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Немачка пецива су прилично добра, а у Баварској су прилично богата и разноврсна, слично као и она од њеног јужног суседа, Аустрије. Воћно пециво је често, са јабукама печеним у току целе године, док се вишње и шљиве појављују у току лета. Многи немачки пекарски производи такође садрже бадеме, лешнике и друге орашасте плодове. Популарни колачи често се посебно добро слажу са шољом јаке кафе. Ако желите нека мала, али богата пецива, пробајте оно што се у зависности од региона назива берлинер, фанкухен или крафен.
mt: German pastries are pretty good, and in Bavaria they are pretty rich and varied, similar to those of its southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastry is common, with apples baked throughout the year, while cherries and plums appear in the summer. Many German bakery products also contain almonds, hazelnuts and other nutty fruits. Popular cakes often go well with a strong cup of coffee. If you want a little, but rich pastry, try what is called in different regions Berliner, Fanchen or Krafen.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
